info.name: Wrapper
info.description:
Welcome to Foodgasm API. This documentation describes how to connect and use our backend server for the consumption of your mobile or frontend applications. Here you can find examples of request bodies, responses, query strings, etc which are required by our backend server.

# Base URL
Development Environment: **https://stg11prov.foodgasm.id/api/dev-v1**
Production Environment: **https://stg11prov.foodgasm.id/api/v1**

Please notice that development environment is ended by */dev-v1, while the production URL is terminated by */v1**.

# Request Header
| Header | Value | Description |
| ------ | ----- | ------------|
| Content-Type | application/json | Responds from the server will be sent in the form of JSON |
| Accept | application/json | Our backend server also expects input in the form of JSON |
| Authorization | Bearer _token value_ | The token value is what you will receive after succesful login |


# Order Creation Flowchart

![order creation flowchart](https://stg11prov.foodgasm.id/img/dia/basic_order.png)
